title.rendered: Rehlat offers / Singapore Airlines off – free Economy class ticket to Singapore

content.rendered:
You can plan your family vacation or travelling solo, there’s a destination to suit every interest. Book Singapore Airlines and explore many beautiful destinations around the world with your friends and family.

Book by 15th March 2020 & get a chance to win a premium economy class ticket to Singapore.

Booking validity: 12th Jan 2020 – 15th March 2020
Travel validity: 12th Jan 2020 – 30th June 2020

Travel destinations:

From To
Dubai Singapore
Dubai Davao
Dubai Phuket
Dubai Penang
Dubai Kuala Lumpur
Dubai Bali
Dubai Ho Chi Minh
Dubai Hong Kong
Dubai Tokyo
Dubai Kansai
Dubai Incheon
Dubai Australia

Book your flight tickets with Rehlat and get free Economy class ticket to Singapore

Terms and conditions:

  • The free ticket contest is applicable only on all Singapore Airlines’ bookings done from Dubai
  • The contest is not applicable on codeshare flights.
  • Book Singapore Airlines’ round trip flight tickets from Dubai to Singapore, Davao, Phuket, Penang, Kuala Lumpur, Bali, Ho Chi Minh, Hong Kong, Tokyo, Kansai, Incheon, & Australia & get a chance to win the free premium economy class ticket to Singapore.
  • Winners would be announced on 18th March 2020 on Rehlat’s official social channels on Instagram, Facebook, & Twitter
  • Free flight ticket would be from Dubai to Singapore.
  • The winner can choose their preferred dates of flying to Singapore. The travel to Singapore has to be done by 30th September 2020.
  • No blackout dates apply
  • Team Rehlat would contact the winner via email.
  • Taxes & surcharges for the free flight ticket have to be borne by the winner.
  • Seats are subject to availability and embargo applies.
  • Ticket is non-transferable & cannot be exchanged to cash.
  • Rehlat will have the right to photograph the winners and their entry constitutes Rehlat to use their names and pictures in advertising for no additional compensation.
